questions.author: Veruca Salt
questions.question: Do I have a cold?
questions.notes: I can't tell if I have a cold or allergies. My symptoms include a scratchy throat, burning eyes and runny nose

questions.notes: The answer is yes! Come down now for discounts up to 30%! It's a blowout!

questions.author: Tiki Torch Tom
questions.question: Is my head being on fire normal?
questions.notes: People say it is because of what I am. I wish people cared more also who I am...
